description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 04 March 2022 (ref. 22/00105/FULL) (which varied permission ref. 16/07799/FULL) for: 'Alterations including erection of extensions at rear lower ground, ground and first floor levels, creation of roof terrace at rear third floor level, replacement of non-original windows, external repair works and landscaping'.Namely, to allow internal and external amendments. Internally, amendments include modifications to services to enhance their functionality and meet building and fire regulations; mainly by amending the positioning of consented internal fan coil units; inserting one new secondary ceiling to accommodate services; installing new sprinkler units and other minor modifications to services ; and internal alterations to the proposed detailed works across the building. Externally, amendments include the installation of small ventilation points to provide adequate ventilation; the provision of slim double glazing rather than single glazing to enhance energy performance and sustainability; and minor changes to improve the consented hard landscaping and terrace to the rear garden, replacing the approved limestone tiles with porcelain and the consented mesh above the balustrading with a trellis (Linked with 22/07112/LBC).
